section.1: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Ubaidullah bin 'Abdullah bin 'Umar that his father said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah being asked about water in the wilderness that is frequented by beasts and predators. The Messenger of Allah said: "If the water reaches the amount of two Qullah, nothing can make it impure (Najis).'" (Sahih) Another chain with similar wording
